Your Data For Life shirt must be paired with your device via Bluetooth
In your device settings, go to bluetooth and turn it on
Make sure Data For Life battery is fully charged and clipped to the t-shirt
Open Data For Life app and Log in On the first screen, you will see a list of all active Data For Life t-shirts around you. Tape on your t-shirt unique ID to pair it.
Wait a few seconds until your Data For Life is paired and properly paired. You will be automatically redirected to the home page.
